meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or disdain.
meanings.sent2: Faugh! I can't stand the taste of broccoli.
meanings.sent3: Faugh! Who left this mess in the kitchen?
meanings.sent4: Faugh! The sight of that spider makes my skin crawl.
meanings.sent5: Faugh! The spoiled milk made me gag.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of disgust or revulsion.
meanings.sent1: Oh faugh! This garbage stinks so bad.
meanings.sent2: Ew, faugh! I accidentally stepped in dog poop.
meanings.sent3: Ha, faugh! Your joke was so bad, it made me cringe.
meanings.sent4: Wow, faugh! The horror movie was so scary, I couldn't sleep.
meanings.sent5: Yuck, faugh! The slimy texture of the food made me shiver.
